metadata.title: CVE-2022-20009 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In various functions of the USB gadget subsystem, there is a possible outof bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-213172319References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
